name: Angry Horse Fighting Cup
description:
What can be more interesting than wild animals’ battles? Absolutely nothing! Today you’re going to play for this portly and majestic animal – wild horse! Defeat all your predatory rivals like wolves, bears and foxes in a fair fight and prove that you’re worth the title of the most powerful horse of this game! Play Angry Horse Fighting Cup and just enjoy this ultimate fighting!

Watch this eternal fight right in the forefront – just choose your horse fighter and rush into the battle! Be ready for the most significant battle of your life! Kick, smash, punch, bite, use special martial arts (made for horses, of course) and let your mortal rival absolutely no chance to win this confrontation! Choose your horse to become really fast and dexterous, learn the martial art of your species, use various ways to defeat your mortal rival and just win the battle!

Develop your special skills to become really fast, dexterous and strong, power your super horse up and become really mighty! Do your best and protect and defend the honor of your animal’s clan – become the best fighter ever! Become the best fighter and solve this mystery proving your friends who’s the most powerful animal on this planet! Enjoy Angry Horse Fighting Cup game!

Earn some points defeating your mortal enemies and improve all the characteristics of your fighter or buy a new one! Enjoy this fantastic duel fighting between horses and other animals! Unlock all the horse warriors, power its characteristics up to the perfection level and have fun!

Angry Horse Fighting Cup features:
• Opportunity to rush into this fight between horses
• Great variety of horse warriors and other animal fighters
• Wide range of interesting mortal technics to defeat your enemy
• Fantastically colorful surroundings in 3D

Participate this ultimate animal war between wild horses and other animals! Choose your horse to become really fast and dexterous, learn the martial art of your species and have fun playing Angry Horse Fighting Cup!
